text:
Located at 161 Bukit Batok Street 11, in the middle of St Luke's Hospital and Bukit Batok West Shopping Mall. You can take buses 990 or 187 to get here and walk about 5 to 10 mins.

They are a convenient store located under a HDB estate which locals call it a mama shop. It's somewhat a mini 7-Eleven. They operate as a Shopee collection point for your parcels and unless you stay around their neighborhood, I would highly recommend to not choose your pick up point to be here. There are other simpler and easier pick up locations by automated machines from Pick Lockers or PopStations which are accessible 24hrs. The people in this store aren't the most efficient and they do prioritize their business selling stuff than helping you to get your parcel when you personally head over for collection. Most important factor is their operational hours aren't fixed and it would be frustrating if they aren't open.

Attempted to collect parcel here at 7.15pm, stall owner just started closing and didn't want to let me collect telling me stall closes at 7 even though Lazada shows closing time is 7.30. Please update collection timing.Do not recommend collecting parcels from here

Pick up hours strictly end at 7.30pm, no exceptions, which would be acceptable if they were consistent with their normal hours. Attempted to pick up Shopee packages twice and the entire store was closed despite their opening hours stating otherwise.

Not a recommended pickup point if there are other options/you can avoid it.

Do not send your shopee or Lazada parcel there. They want to do our business but lazy and ask u to wait there like a fool for several
Minutes because they claim havenâ€™t sort out parcel or entertain their main audience the secondary school kids! Then why accept parcel jobs
Went to collect shopee parcel at 7pm on a Friday but it was closed already. Does not follow the opening hours stated by delivery.
